feed.title: BIPS proposal for implementing AML-KYC in bitcoin

entry.title: BIPS proposal for implementing AML-KYC in bitcoin
entry.summary: On August 27th, 2015, a user named prabhat posted on the bitcoin-dev forum asking for a solution to a particular problem. It is unclear what problem they were referring to as only their response of "Fine point" is visible in the thread. However, the user then suggests doing nothing as a potential solution. It is unknown if this suggestion was taken into consideration or acted upon.
